trans-unit.source: Provides the logic to establish a timer and to wait, asynchronously, for timer's expiration.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce la logica per stabilire un timer e di attesa, in modo asincrono, per la scadenza del timer.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Questa classe non può essere ereditata.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] When notified that its timer has expired, a DelayActivity completes its execution.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]Quando una notifica che il timer è scaduto, DelayActivity completa l'esecuzione.

trans-unit.source: You can set a time out on the DelayActivity so that your workflow pauses before resuming execution.
trans-unit.target: È possibile impostare un timeout sul DelayActivity in modo che il flusso di lavoro viene sospeso prima di riprendere l'esecuzione.

trans-unit.source: You specify the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A> using <xref:System.TimeSpan>.
trans-unit.target: Si specifica l' <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A>utilizzo di <xref:System.TimeSpan>.</xref:System.TimeSpan> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A>

trans-unit.source: This causes your workflow to pause until the specified <xref:System.TimeSpan> has elapsed.
trans-unit.target: In questo modo, il flusso di lavoro venga sospeso finché non è specificato <xref:System.TimeSpan>trascorsa.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: The DelayActivity class runs the code method associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.InitializeTimeoutDuration> event before the activity starts and the code-beside method can be used to initialize the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: La classe DelayActivity esegue il metodo di codice associato il <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.InitializeTimeoutDuration>evento prima dell'inizio dell'attività e il metodo code-beside può essere utilizzato per inizializzare il <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A>proprietà.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.InitializeTimeoutDuration>

trans-unit.source: The DelayActivity is guaranteed to complete no sooner than the indicated <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A>.
trans-unit.target: È garantito il DelayActivity il completamento non avvenga indicato <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A>

trans-unit.source: The delay can take longer because the timer notification might occur some time after the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A> is reached.
trans-unit.target: Il ritardo può richiedere più tempo perché la notifica del timer potrebbe verificarsi qualche tempo dopo il <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A>viene raggiunto.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A>

trans-unit.source: One reason for a longer delay is if the workflow is running under high system stress in a server environment.
trans-unit.target: Uno dei motivi per un ritardo più lungo è se il flusso di lavoro viene eseguito sotto stress elevati del sistema in un ambiente server.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity"></xref> class using the name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity"> </xref> classe utilizzando il nome dell'attività.

trans-unit.source: The user-defined name of the activity.
trans-unit.target: Il nome dell'attività definita dall'utente.

trans-unit.source: Occurs before the time-out duration starts.
trans-unit.target: Si verifica prima che inizi la durata del timeout.

trans-unit.source: This event should not be used to set the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A> for a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity>.
trans-unit.target: Questo evento non deve essere utilizzato per impostare <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A>per un <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity>.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration%2A>

trans-unit.source: The time-out duration should be set in the workflow's `InitializeComponent` method instead.
trans-unit.target: Impostare la durata del timeout del flusso di lavoro `InitializeComponent` metodo invece.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.

trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that targets the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.InitializeTimeoutDuration"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"> </xref> che fa riferimento il <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.InitializeTimeoutDuration"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the workflow queue that will be delivered when the timer expires.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il nome della coda del flusso di lavoro che verrà recapitato alla scadenza del timer.

trans-unit.source: The name of the workflow queue is set by the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.CreateWorkflowQueue%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Il nome della coda del flusso di lavoro viene impostato mediante il <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.CreateWorkflowQueue%2A>metodo.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueuingService.CreateWorkflowQueue%2A>

trans-unit.source: The name of the workflow queue.
trans-unit.target: Il nome della coda del flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: Creates the subscription of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity"></xref> to an event.
trans-unit.target: Crea la sottoscrizione del <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity"> </xref> a un evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> that represents the execution environment of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"> </xref> che rappresenta l'ambiente di esecuzione del <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.EventHandler> for the parent event.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.EventHandler>per l'evento padre.</xref:System.EventHandler>

trans-unit.source: parentContext or parentEventHandler is .
trans-unit.target: parentContextor parentEventHandler is .

trans-unit.source: Cancels the subscription of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity"></xref> to an event.
trans-unit.target: Annulla la sottoscrizione del <xref href="System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity"> </xref> a un evento.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"></xref> that represents the execution environment of the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.ActivityExecutionContext"> </xref> che rappresenta l'ambiente di esecuzione del <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets and sets the duration of the delay in the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene e imposta la durata del ritardo nel flusso di lavoro.

trans-unit.source: The time period set in this property determines the time the workflow will sit idle before the workflow proceeds to the next activity.
trans-unit.target: Il periodo di tempo impostato in questa proprietà determina il tempo che il flusso di lavoro resterà inattivo prima che il flusso di lavoro consente di passare all'attività successiva.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.TimeSpan> that indicates the length of the delay in the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref:System.TimeSpan>che indica la lunghezza del ritardo nel flusso di lavoro.</xref:System.TimeSpan>

trans-unit.source: Represents the <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"></xref> that targets the <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration*> property.
trans-unit.target: Rappresenta il <xref href="System.Workflow.ComponentModel.DependencyProperty"> </xref> che fa riferimento il <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration*>proprietà.</xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity.TimeoutDuration*>

trans-unit.target: Da aggiungere.
